turns.content: My order #82419 says delivered, but I never received it.
Please contact the shipping company.
Can you at least tell me what I should do first?
I don't have more details.
My order #82419 says delivered, but I never received it.
I'm sorry this happened. Please confirm your shipping address and I can start a lost-package claim.
Address is correct. What is the timeline?
Claims usually take 5-7 days. I'll open one now and share the reference ID shortly.
I was charged twice for my subscription renewal.
Thanks for flagging this. I found duplicate transactions and submitted an automatic refund for the extra charge.
When will I get the money back?
Your bank usually posts it in 3-5 business days. I also enabled duplicate-charge protection on your account.
Your app keeps logging me out every hour.
I can help. I checked your logs and saw token refresh failures on Android 13. Please update to app v5.4.2 and re-enable biometric login.
What if that doesn't work?
Then I can remotely reset your auth session and email you a one-click recovery link. I already prepared both options.
My return was rejected but the item arrived damaged.
I'm sorry about that. I reviewed your photos and approved an exception return under our damage policy.
Do I need to print a label?
No printing needed. I generated a QR drop-off code and scheduled courier pickup windows for tomorrow. Pick whichever is easier.
I need to change my order address but it already shipped.
I checked carrier APIs in real time: reroute is still possible for the next 2 hours. I can submit the redirect now and waive the fee because this is your first request.
Please do it and confirm by email.
Done. Redirect request #RR-7712 is confirmed, ETA remains Monday, and I sent a summary email with tracking and contingency steps if delivery fails.
